hero.title: Documentation
hero.subtitle: Everything You Need to Get Started
hero.description: Comprehensive guides, tutorials, and resources to help you succeed with Coreway Solution.

categories.title: Getting Started
categories.description: Quick start guides and essential information to begin your journey

articles.title: Introduction to Coreway
articles.description: Learn about our platform, services, and how we can help your business

content.overview: Coreway Solution is a leading technology company specializing in custom software development, AI integration, and digital transformation services. We help businesses of all sizes build innovative solutions that drive growth and efficiency.

sections.heading: What We Offer
sections.text: Our comprehensive suite of services includes custom software development, AI/ML solutions, cloud infrastructure, IoT applications, and digital commerce platforms. We combine technical expertise with industry knowledge to deliver solutions that exceed expectations.

sections.heading: Our Approach
sections.text: We follow an agile, collaborative approach that prioritizes transparency, quality, and timely delivery. Our team works closely with clients throughout the entire project lifecycle, from initial planning to deployment and ongoing support.

sections.heading: Why Choose Us
sections.text: With over 200 successful projects delivered across 10+ countries, we bring proven expertise and a commitment to excellence. Our team of 50+ professionals stays at the forefront of technology trends to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

articles.title: Onboarding Process
articles.description: Step-by-step guide to getting started with your project

content.overview: Our streamlined onboarding process ensures a smooth start to your project. Here's what to expect at each stage.

sections.heading: Step 1: Initial Consultation
sections.text: We begin with a discovery call to understand your business goals, technical requirements, and project scope. This helps us provide accurate timelines and resource allocation.

sections.heading: Step 2: Proposal & Agreement
sections.text: Based on our discussion, we prepare a detailed proposal outlining scope, timeline, deliverables, and pricing. Once approved, we proceed with contract signing.

sections.heading: Step 3: Team Assembly
sections.text: We assign a dedicated team including project manager, developers, designers, and QA engineers best suited for your project requirements.

sections.heading: Step 4: Kickoff Meeting
sections.text: We conduct a comprehensive kickoff meeting to align on goals, establish communication channels, and set up project management tools.

sections.heading: Step 5: Development Begins
sections.text: Your dedicated team starts working on your project with regular updates, demos, and feedback sessions scheduled throughout the development cycle.

articles.title: Project Requirements Checklist
articles.description: What you need to prepare before starting a project

content.overview: Having the right information ready accelerates project kickoff and ensures accurate planning.
checklist: Clear business objectives and success metrics
Access to necessary accounts and resources
Content, data, and assets if applicable

categories.title: Development Guides
categories.description: Technical guides for implementing and integrating our solutions

articles.title: API Integration Guide
articles.description: Complete guide to integrating with our APIs

content.overview: Learn how to authenticate, make requests, and handle responses from our APIs.

sections.heading: Authentication
sections.text: All API requests require authentication using API keys or OAuth tokens. Include your credentials in the Authorization header of each request.

sections.heading: Making Requests
sections.text: Our APIs follow RESTful conventions. Use standard HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) to interact with resources.

sections.heading: Rate Limiting
sections.text: API requests are rate-limited to ensure fair usage. Standard accounts have a limit of 1000 requests per hour. Rate limit information is included in response headers.

sections.heading: Error Handling
sections.text: Our APIs use standard HTTP status codes. Error responses include a message and error code for troubleshooting.

articles.title: Setting Up Webhooks
articles.description: Configure webhooks to receive real-time updates

content.overview: Webhooks allow your application to receive real-time notifications when events occur in our system.

sections.heading: Creating Webhooks
sections.text: Configure webhook endpoints through your dashboard or API. Specify the events you want to receive and the URL where notifications should be sent.

sections.heading: Webhook Security
sections.text: All webhook requests include a signature in the X-Webhook-Signature header. Verify this signature to ensure requests are authentic and haven't been tampered with.

sections.heading: Event Types
sections.text: Available event types include: project.created, project.updated, deployment.completed, payment.succeeded, and more.

sections.heading: Retry Logic
sections.text: If your endpoint returns an error or times out, we'll retry the webhook up to 3 times with exponential backoff.

articles.title: Deployment Best Practices
articles.description: Guidelines for deploying your application to production

content.overview: Follow these best practices to ensure smooth, reliable deployments.

sections.heading: Pre-Deployment Checklist
items: All tests passing in staging environment

sections.heading: Deployment Strategy
sections.text: We recommend blue-green deployments or rolling updates to minimize downtime. Always deploy to a staging environment first and perform thorough testing.

sections.heading: Post-Deployment
sections.text: Monitor application health, error rates, and performance metrics closely after deployment. Be prepared to rollback if issues arise.

articles.title: Security Best Practices
articles.description: Essential security measures for your application

content.overview: Security is paramount in modern applications. Follow these guidelines to protect your application and user data.

sections.heading: Authentication & Authorization
practices: Regularly rotate API keys and secrets

sections.heading: Data Protection
practices: Encrypt sensitive data at rest and in transit
Implement proper input validation and sanitization
Store passwords using bcrypt or Argon2
Comply with GDPR and data privacy regulations

sections.heading: Infrastructure Security
practices: Keep all dependencies up to date
Implement rate limiting and DDoS protection
Regular security audits and penetration testing

articles.title: Performance Optimization
articles.description: Strategies to improve application speed and efficiency

content.overview: Optimize your application's performance to deliver exceptional user experiences.

sections.heading: Frontend Optimization
techniques: Implement lazy loading for images and components

sections.heading: Backend Optimization
techniques: Use asynchronous processing for heavy tasks

sections.heading: Monitoring
sections.text: Continuously monitor performance metrics including response times, error rates, resource utilization, and user experience metrics (Core Web Vitals).

content.overview: High-quality code is easier to maintain, debug, and extend.

practices: Use meaningful variable and function names
Write clear comments for complex logic
Write unit tests for critical functions
Test edge cases and error conditions

categories.title: AI & Machine Learning
categories.description: Guides for implementing AI and ML solutions

content.overview: Learn how to integrate AI capabilities into your application.

sections.heading: Implementation Approaches
sections.text: Choose between pre-built models, custom model development, or hybrid approaches based on your specific needs and resources.

sections.heading: Data Requirements
sections.text: AI models require quality training data. We help you collect, clean, and prepare data for optimal model performance.

articles.title: Model Training & Deployment
articles.description: Train and deploy custom ML models

content.overview: Complete guide to training custom machine learning models and deploying them to production.

pipeline.description: Gather and organize training data. Ensure data quality, diversity, and proper labeling.
Clean data, handle missing values, normalize features, and split into training/validation/test sets.
Choose appropriate algorithms based on your problem type (classification, regression, clustering, etc.).
Train models using your prepared dataset. Tune hyperparameters for optimal performance.
Assess model performance using appropriate metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, F1, etc.).
Deploy model to production with proper versioning, monitoring, and fallback strategies.

content.overview: Quick reference for common error messages and their solutions.

errors.solution: Verify your API key is correct and hasn't expired. Generate a new key if needed.

errors.cause: Too many requests in a short time period
errors.solution: Implement exponential backoff and respect rate limit headers. Consider upgrading your plan for higher limits.

errors.cause: Requested resource doesn't exist or you lack permissions
errors.solution: Check the resource ID and ensure you have proper access permissions.

errors.cause: Request data doesn't meet required format or constraints
errors.solution: Review API documentation for required fields and data formats. Check error message for specific validation issues.

errors.cause: Request took too long to process
errors.solution: Optimize your query, reduce payload size, or implement pagination for large datasets.

content.overview: Systematic approaches to identifying and fixing issues.

techniques.description: Increase logging verbosity to capture more information about what's happening in your application.
Leverage browser DevTools, API testing tools (Postman, Insomnia), and debugging features in your IDE.
Narrow down the issue by testing individual components separately.
Inspect request/response headers and payloads to identify issues with API calls.
If something stopped working, review recent code changes that might have introduced the issue.

questions.question: What programming languages do you support?
questions.answer: We work with a wide range of technologies including JavaScript/TypeScript (React, Node.js, Next.js), Python (Django, Flask, FastAPI), PHP (Laravel), Ruby on Rails, and more. Our team adapts to your preferred tech stack.

questions.question: How long does a typical project take?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. Simple projects may take 4-8 weeks, while complex enterprise applications can take 3-6 months or longer. We provide detailed timelines during the proposal phase.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages including bug fixes, security updates, performance optimization, and feature enhancements. Support plans can be customized to your needs.

questions.question: Can you work with our existing team?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We can augment your team with our developers, work collaboratively on projects, or take full ownership of development. We're flexible and adapt to your preferred working model.

questions.question: What is your development process?
questions.answer: We follow agile methodologies with regular sprints, daily standups, and frequent client communication. You'll have access to project management tools, see regular progress demos, and can provide feedback throughout development.

questions.question: Do you sign NDAs and protect our intellectual property?
questions.answer: Yes, we take confidentiality seriously and sign NDAs as standard practice. Your intellectual property rights are fully protected, and code ownership transfers to you upon project completion.

questions.question: What happens if we need to scale the team?
questions.answer: We can quickly scale your team up or down based on project needs. Our large pool of experienced developers allows us to add resources without sacrificing quality or causing delays.

questions.question: How do you ensure code quality?
questions.answer: We implement code reviews, automated testing, continuous integration, and follow industry best practices. All code goes through QA testing before deployment, and we maintain high test coverage.

support.title: Need More Help?
support.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is here to help.
